snippet: A parole-style panel at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba, said Abdel Malik al-Rahabi should remain there indefinitely to “protect against a continuing significant threat.”
abstract: Parole-style panel at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, is recommending that the military continue to hold Yemeni man Abdel Malik al-Rahabi in indefinite wartime detention; decision is the first of its kind for the Obama administration's new Periodic Review Board system.
lead_paragraph: A parole-style panel at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba, said Abdel Malik al-Rahabi should remain there indefinitely to “protect against a continuing significant threat.”

headline.main: Panel Says Yemeni Man Should Stay in Detention
headline.print_headline: Panel Says Yemeni Man Should Stay in Detention

keywords.value: Rahabi, Abdel Malik Ahmed Abdel Wahab al-
